Wen, Yilin Frances

About Me

I'm currently a final-year Ph.D. student at The University of Hong Kong, and also a project research associate at Sugano-Lab, Institute of Industrial Science, The University of Tokyo. My research interest is related to 6D object pose estimation, and human activity understanding.

Education

[2018.9-] Ph.D., The University of Hong Kong, Supervisor: Prof. Wang Wenping and Prof. Komura Taku

[2014.9-2018.6] B.Eng., Shandong University

Experience

[2024.3-] Visiting Associate Research Fellow, The University of Tokyo, Advisor: Prof. Sugano Yusuke

[2023.3-2024.2] Visiting Associate Research Fellow, The University of Tokyo, Advisor: Prof. Sato Yoichi

[2021.1-2021.7] Research Intern, Microsoft Research Asia, Advisor: Dr. Pan Hao

[2017.7-2017.8] Research Intern, The University of Hong Kong, Advisor: Prof. Wang Wenping

[2015.11-2018.6] Student Research Assistant, Shandong University, Advisor: Dr. Zhong Fan
